translations: n.情人；情人卡（valentine 的复数）

sentences.sentence: At first I thought he was stealing valentines from Michael Rogers's box.
sentences.translation: 一开始我以为他在偷迈克尔·罗杰斯盒子里的情人节礼物。

sentences.sentence: When I got to the classroom, there was Michael Peterson, at Michael Rogers's desk, digging in his box of valentines!
sentences.translation: 当我走进教室的时候，迈克尔·彼得森已经坐在迈克尔·罗杰斯的桌子前，正翻着他的情人节礼物盒！
